nav.div: Coastal Plains Charter High School » About US » News » What's New » Update on COVID-19

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Update on COVID-19
img.span: Following the orders of Governor Kemp, Coastal Plains Charter High School will remain closed for the remainder of this school year. Students are encouraged to keep working while the physical sites are closed. Please communicate daily with the staff on call.

span.br: The Governor’s Office has created a website that lists publicly available access by county and resources available by communication suppliers. Please check back often as additional sites and information will be added as they continue to collect. https://broadband.georgia.gov/georgia-internet-access-covid-19-update

div.div: 210 South College Street, Metter, Georgia | Phone 912-685-5713 ext. 0571 | Fax
